In-Room Auction
Date: Wednesday, 20 December 2017 from 6:30
Venue: Merrimu Receptions
1300 Dandenong Road, Murrumbeena (Melways Ref.69 C4)

Offering outstanding access to Westall Primary School, Westall Secondary College on Rosebank Ave only 300 metres away, Westall train station, Keeley Park, local shops and Monash University Clayton Campus, IKEA Centre, it's an opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Every Bit The Spacious Family Upgrade
Begin the next chapter of your growing family's journey with space, comfort and convenience with this big and spacious five-bedroom family home, nestled in a peaceful family-friendly neighbourhood only moments from Westall primary and secondary schools, Westall train station, bus services, Monash Medical Centre, scenic parkland and numerous shops and cafes.
Strong and solid with the added luxury of three separate living zones, harmonious family living is what this family residence does best. So if you need a home to keep your growing pains at bay, this is the family upgrade you need!
You'll be captivated by the sheer size and scale of the stately formal lounge (with bar) on entry that connects with the formal dining room, while that essence of space extends into the radiant informal living area and well-appointed kitchen equipped with plenty of bench and storage space.
Three bedrooms of generous proportions (master with ensuite, built-in robes and a large walk-in dressing room) are zoned in privacy downstairs, while two additional bedrooms, a powder room and sizeable retreat are comfortably accommodated upstairs.
Kids will enjoy running around the grassed front yard that's private and secure, while a bright family bathroom downstairs, large laundry, secure off-street parking and ducted heating adds further appeal to this exciting family upgrade that also boasts scope for a modern touch now or in the future.
